#summary This page documents the dependencies of OpenNERO and various mods.
#sidebar TableOfContents

= Dependencies =

== OpenNERO core dependencies: ==

  * python
  * libboost-python
  * libboost-filesystem
  * libboost-serialization
  * libboost-system
  * libboost-date-time

== Dependencies of Mods: ==

  * BlocksTower (Planning, NLP):
    * python-tk
  * NERO Training:
    * Current version: openjdk-6-jre
    * Pure python version: python-wxgtk2.8
  * Vision:
    * python-wxgtk2.8
    * python-imaging-tk
    * python-scipy
    * python-numpy
